participant_abstract.sent: We present our colorful prototype with LCD display in the flip top and discuss the cost, as well as the marketing issues.

participant_actions.sent: The product prototypes will be developed and tested in the market prior to launch.
We will use online ordering and order fulfillment in order to cut costs and to expedite the delivery of custom solutions.

And to use the sports event as a venue for the launch.
